summary: This mod keeps the game from CTD when start showRaceMenu. You can use many hair Mods, and almost no delay. It does not effect any other mods.
descriptionHtml:
Notice:
I uploaded this mod at my own accout for Update or so, sorry for moving address.
Thanks to Veladarius, first uploader.
Old page: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33226

---------------------------------------------------------------
 Description
---------------------------------------------------------------
This mod keeps the game from CTD when start showRaceMenu. You can use many hair Mods, and almost no delay. It does not effect any other mods.
Skyrim tries to load all hairs and such when you open showRaceMenu, but it is a cause of crashing. This mod removes this cache, and is that you will notice a slight lag when changing eyes, eyebrows or hair. But slight lag is better than crashing.


---------------------------------------------------------------
 Requirements
---------------------------------------------------------------
SKSE 1.6.9 or higher, and Skyrim version 1.8.151, 1.9.29 or 1.9.32


---------------------------------------------------------------
 Installation
---------------------------------------------------------------
NMM or BAIN ready.
Manually, copy dll to the SKSE plugins folder: Data\\SKSE\\Plugins


---------------------------------------------------------------
 ChangeLog
---------------------------------------------------------------
v1.3
support Skyrim version 1.9.32

v1.2
support Skyrim version 1.9.29

v1.0 - 1.1
Uploaded to NEXUS by Veladarius

v0.1
Initial release


---------------------------------------------------------------
 Credit
---------------------------------------------------------------
SKSE team	- SKSE
Bethesda Softworks
author: kapaer
